pageTitle: ISM COMMUNICATIONS CORP (ISM:Philippines): Stock Quote & Company Profile - Businessweek
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {4825=ISM Communications Corporation does not have significant operations. Previously, it was engaged in the telecommunications, multimedia, and information technology businesses. The company was formerly known as Itogon-Suyoc Mines, Inc. and changed its name to ISM Communications Corporation in June 2002. ISM Communications Corporation was incorporated in 1925 and is based in Makati City, the Philippines., 9167=ISM Communications Corp. announced financial results for the year ended December 31, 2014. For the year, the company reported net loss before tax of PHP 586,358,375 compared to net income before tax of PHP 122,811,112 a year ago. Net loss after tax of PHP 586,626,278 compared to net income before tax of PHP 122,811,112 a year ago. Loss per basic and diluted share was PHP 0.31 compared to earnings per basic and diluted share of PHP 0.07 a year ago. Negative return on assets was 12.9% compared to return on assets of 0.03% a year ago. Negative return on equity was 14.37% compared to return on equity of 0.03% a year ago., 10182=ISM Communications Corporation announced that Jose Ernesto C. Villaluna, Jr. resigned as an independent director of the company effective January 27, 2015., 7928=ISM Communications Corp. reported unaudited earnings results for the first quarter ended March 31, 2015. For the period, the company reported loss from operations of PHP 9,019,926 against PHP 3,801,272 a year ago. Income before income tax was PHP 17,796,733 against loss before income tax of PHP 2,546,433 a year ago. Net income or total comprehensive income was PHP 17,796,733 against net loss or total comprehensive loss of PHP 2,546,433 a year ago. Basic and diluted earnings per share were PHP 0.0248 against loss per share of PHP 0.0013 share a year ago. Net cash provided by operating activities was PHP 591,889,141 against net cash used in operating activities of PHP 2,164,163 million a year ago. Return on assets was 0.70% against negative return on assets of 0.05% a year ago. Return on equity was 0.80% against negative return on equity of 0.06% a year ago.}
